title: [G3] Looking for ranked team
body:
I've been gold for the last 2 seasons, but mainly played casually, I'm looking to start climbing in SoloQ and I'm also interested in find a ranked 5's team.
Not too concerned the rank of the team, aslong as the players are competent.
I can play all roles, and most champions, but support is my strongest role, and I'd highly prefer to do that.
I've got all voice coms & a mic, and I'm free to play pretty much anytime.

replies.body:
If your still waiting for someone send me a request and we can maybe make a team, i have other people that can fill in the extra spots if needed
i am only Bronze V but i'm actually not to bad, i have been stuck like this for the past 2 seasons :(. I can play most roles well but mid is my best. 
I am also free to play pretty much anytime with a mic
Im not to great at warding and roaming though, i mostly just never remember to do either of them 
I hope to play with you soon!
Hello. Looking to put together a gold+ team. Looking to play quite abit. If your interested chuck me an add.
